definition: sage Emperors Shun and Yao rule every day (idiom); all for the best in the best of all possible worlds
Shun (c. 23rd century BC), mythical sage and leader
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
surname Yao/Yao or Tang Yao (c. 2200 BC), one of Five legendary Emperors 五帝[wu3 di4], second son of Di Ku 帝嚳|帝喾[Di4 Ku4]
